description: The Windflower (Anemone hybrida 'Andrea Atkinson') is an amazing species of flowering plant with beautiful, vibrant petals. Growing up to 90cm tall, these plants produce elegant saucer-shaped flowers with radiating petals. Their pink-violet petals are complemented by a dark center that resembles a star. It is a hardy plant that blooms throughout summer and early autumn, making it an excellent choice for late season colour. Its fuller, denser habit is well-suited for beds, borders or containers in sun or light shade, adding a beautiful touch of colour to any garden.
